headline: Nuclear and power stocks climb as U.S. boosts fuel funding
summary: Investing.com -- Nuclear and power-related stocks gained on Tuesday after the U.S. government moved to expand domestic nuclear fuel production and as renewed enthusiasm around artificial intelligence increased investor interest in companies supplying power to data centres.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: AIG, Vistra, Microchip, Under Armour
summary: ↗️ Vistra (VST): The power-generation company plans to buy Cogentrix Energy in a roughly $4 billion deal that will include natural-gas generation facilities. Shares rallied as much as 5% Tuesday morning.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Vistra (VST) After Its Strong Multi Year Rally?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Vistra shares still offer value at around US$162.93, this article will walk through what the current price might mean for you as an investor. The stock has moved only slightly in the short term, with a 0.2% gain over the last 7 days, a 2.5% decline over 30 days, and a 1.4% decline year to date. The 1 year return sits at 0.3%, and the 3 and 5 year returns are very large, around 7x and higher. Recent attention on Vistra has been shaped by news around the...

headline: Vistra Expands Gas Fleet With $4 Billion Cogentrix Acquisition
